title: Drawing, "Project for a ceiling painting"
medium: Pencil, pen, brush and sepia on light green paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: vertical rectangle.  above, the couple are sitting, between at left: a woman playing the tamborine, and man approaching at right: extends a wreath.  below a woman with a putti is lying and below her are two putti supporting a wreath of wine.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for a ceiling painting".
Pencil, pen, brush and sepia on light green paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1675.
